content.original: An Internal Hardpoint System capable of swapping through a multitude of Munitions. All Stats of this Weapon are derived from loaded Munitions Requires Specialist Slot and (HP) Munitions
content.prevOriginal: An Internal Hardpoint System capable of swapping through a multitude of Munitions. All Stats of this Weapon are derived from loaded Munitions Requires Specialist Slot and (HP) Munitions
content.content: 能够容纳更换多种弹药的内部挂载点系统. 该武器所有的状态都来自其装载的弹药 需要专用槽和挂载点弹药.

content.original: An External Hardpoint System capable of swapping through a multitude of Munitions. All Stats of this Weapon are derived from loaded Munitions Requires Specialist Slot and (HP) Munitions
content.prevOriginal: An External Hardpoint System capable of swapping through a multitude of Munitions. All Stats of this Weapon are derived from loaded Munitions Requires Specialist Slot and (HP) Munitions
content.content: 能够容纳更换多种弹药的外部挂载点系统. 该武器所有的状态都来自其装载的弹药 需要专用槽和挂载点弹药.

content.original: High-Explosive Bombs are one of several common bomb types that can be carried by aerospace and conventional fighters. They are typically carried on external hardpoints common to military aircraft.
content.prevOriginal: High-Explosive Bombs are one of several common bomb types that can be carried by aerospace and conventional fighters. They are typically carried on external hardpoints common to military aircraft.
content.content: 高爆炸弹是空天飞机和常规战斗机可携带的几种常见炸弹类型之一.他们通常在军用飞机常见的外部挂载点上携带.

content.original: Cluster Bombs are a special type of High-Explosive Bomb which can cause damage over a wide area. They are typically carried on external hardpoints common to military aircraft.
content.prevOriginal: Cluster Bombs are a special type of High-Explosive Bomb which can cause damage over a wide area. They are typically carried on external hardpoints common to military aircraft.
content.content: 集束炸弹是一种特殊类型的高爆炸弹,可以在大范围造成破坏.他们通常在军用飞机的外部挂载点上携带.

content.original: High-Explosive Bombs are one of several common bomb types that can be carried by aerospace and conventional fighters. They are typically carried on external hardpoints common to military aircraft.
content.prevOriginal: High-Explosive Bombs are one of several common bomb types that can be carried by aerospace and conventional fighters. They are typically carried on external hardpoints common to military aircraft.

content.original: High-Explosive Bombs are one of several common bomb types that can be carried by aerospace and conventional fighters. They are typically carried on external hardpoints common to military aircraft.
content.prevOriginal: High-Explosive Bombs are one of several common bomb types that can be carried by aerospace and conventional fighters. They are typically carried on external hardpoints common to military aircraft.
content.content: 高爆炸弹是空天飞机和常规战斗机可携带的几种常见炸弹类型之一.他们通常在军用飞机常见的外部挂载点上携带.

content.original: Inferno Bombs are air-dropped munitions which utilize the same Inferno technology found in other weapon systems. While less common than normal high-explosive bombs, Inferno Bombs are useful for wreaking havoc on enemy formations or 'defoliating' forest or jungle areas
content.prevOriginal: Inferno Bombs are air-dropped munitions which utilize the same Inferno technology found in other weapon systems. While less common than normal high-explosive bombs, Inferno Bombs are useful for wreaking havoc on enemy formations or 'defoliating' forest or jungle areas
content.content: 炼狱炸弹是空投弹药,使用与其他武器系统相同的炼狱技术.虽然不如普通高爆弹药常见,但炼狱炸弹可用于对敌人编队造成严重破坏或毁灭丛林或森林地区.

content.original: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller fighters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations.
content.prevOriginal: Not quite as potent as the air-to-air Arrow missiles introduced by the Lyrans and the Wolves, this much smaller air-to-air missile version had its debut with the allied aerospace forces of the Duchy of Tamarind and Duchess Alys Rousset-Marik’s resistance movement. Built smaller and leaner, these so-called light air-to-air (LAA) missiles can be carried by smaller fighters and create far less drag during atmospheric operations.
content.content: 不如天琴同盟国和狼氏族推出的空对空箭导弹威力强大,这种更小的空对空导弹版本首次亮相在塔马林德公国的盟军航空部队和艾丽斯·罗塞特·马里克公爵夫人的抵抗运动.这些轻型空空导弹(LAA)体积更小、重量更轻可以由更小的战斗机携带,在大气圈中作战产生的阻力要小的多.

content.original: Thunder Bombs, also known as FASCAM Bombs, are the air-dropped equivalent to Thunder Arrow Missiles developed by the Terran Hegemony in 2623.
content.prevOriginal: Thunder Bombs, also known as FASCAM Bombs, are the air-dropped equivalent to Thunder Arrow Missiles developed by the Terran Hegemony in 2623.
content.content: 雷电炸弹,众所周知的FASCAM炸弹,是人类霸权在2623年发明的雷电箭导弹的空投版本.

content.original: This missile pod launches a volley of four, fire and forget, guided missiles comparable to the standard Thunderbolt 5 class. 1 SHOT! VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: This missile pod launches a volley of four, fire and forget, guided missiles comparable to the standard Thunderbolt 5 class. 1 SHOT! VOLATILE!
content.content: 这枚导弹舱含有一组四枚导弹,发射后不管,该制导导弹可以与标准霹雳火5系列媲美.1发装!不稳定!

content.original: Rocket Launchers are cheap, unguided, one-shot missile launchers. Rocket Launchers are cheap, unguided, one-shot missile launchers. The Packs have four rockets stacked superposed per tube, each firing cycle launches the front-most rocket.1 SHOT! VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: Rocket Launchers are cheap, unguided, one-shot missile launchers. Rocket Launchers are cheap, unguided, one-shot missile launchers. The Packs have four rockets stacked superposed per tube, each firing cycle launches the front-most rocket.1 SHOT! VOLATILE!
content.content: 火箭弹发射器是廉价的无制导一次性导弹发射器。每个发射器上装有五枚火箭弹，每个发射周期只能发射最前面的火箭弹.1发装! 不稳定!

content.original: The Air-Defense Arrow Missile, also called ADA Missile, was an alternative Arrow IV Artillery missile invented by the Capellan Confederation for use against aerospace fighters. Development of the ADA Missile began in 3066, followed by an experimental prototype design and initial production in 3068. It was field-tested by Capellan forces during Operation SOVEREIGN JUSTICE and later used to combat the Word of Blake.
content.prevOriginal: The Air-Defense Arrow Missile, also called ADA Missile, was an alternative Arrow IV Artillery missile invented by the Capellan Confederation for use against aerospace fighters. Development of the ADA Missile began in 3066, followed by an experimental prototype design and initial production in 3068. It was field-tested by Capellan forces during Operation SOVEREIGN JUSTICE and later used to combat the Word of Blake.
content.content: 防空箭导弹,也被称为ADA导弹,是卡佩兰联邦发明的一种替代箭IV的火炮导弹,用于攻击空天战斗机.ADA导弹的研制始于3066年,随后于3068年进行了试验性原型设计和初步生产.它在主权正义行动中被卡佩兰部队实地测试,后来被用来和布莱克之道战斗.

content.original: The Arrow IV is a stand-alone, missile based, artillery system, designed to augment conventional systems such as the Long Tom and the Sniper. It was first introduced by the Terran Hegemony in 2600 and became a staple of the Star League Defense Force. Although the technology to create Arrow IVs was lost during the Star League's collapse, it was recovered by Capellan Confederation engineers in 3044 working off of surviving examples and the Helm Memory Core.
content.prevOriginal: The Arrow IV is a stand-alone, missile based, artillery system, designed to augment conventional systems such as the Long Tom and the Sniper. It was first introduced by the Terran Hegemony in 2600 and became a staple of the Star League Defense Force. Although the technology to create Arrow IVs was lost during the Star League's collapse, it was recovered by Capellan Confederation engineers in 3044 working off of surviving examples and the Helm Memory Core.
content.content: 箭IV是一种独立的、基于导弹的火炮系统,目的是增强长汤姆(Long Tom)和狙击手(Sniper)等常规系统.它最初是在2600年由人类霸权引入的,并成为星联防御部队的主要装备.尽管在星联崩溃后箭IV的技术失传,但它在3044年被卡佩兰联邦的工程师们从海姆(Helm)记忆核心中恢复.

content.original: Cluster Bombs are a special type of High-Explosive Bomb which can cause damage over a wide area. They are typically carried on external hardpoints common to military aircraft.

content.original: The 'Daisy Cutter', is one of the largest conventional bombs in common use. As it's name suggests it tends to flatten everything in a wide area.
content.prevOriginal: The 'Daisy Cutter', is one of the largest conventional bombs in common use. As it's name suggests it tends to flatten everything in a wide area.
content.content: '雏菊切割器'是最大的常规炸弹之一.顾名思义,它会在大范围内将所有东西夷为平地.

content.original: Fuel Air Explosives are one of several common bomb types that can be carried by aerospace and conventional fighters. They are typically carried on external hardpoints common to military aircraft.
content.prevOriginal: Fuel Air Explosives are one of several common bomb types that can be carried by aerospace and conventional fighters. They are typically carried on external hardpoints common to military aircraft.
content.content: 燃油空爆弹是空天飞机和普通战斗机可携带的几种常见炸弹类型之一.它们通常在军用飞机的外部挂载点上携带.

content.original: Massive Ordnance Air Blast Bombs carry exceptionally large payload of conventional Explosives to obliterate their Target.
content.prevOriginal: Massive Ordnance Air Blast Bombs carry exceptionally large payload of conventional Explosives to obliterate their Target.
content.content: 大型空炸炸弹携带非常大的常规爆炸物,以摧毁其目标.

content.original: Rocket Launchers are cheap, unguided, one-shot missile launchers. Developed by the Marian Hegemony, they often replace more sophisticated equipment that the Periphery nation cannot afford or is unable to repair.1 SHOT! VOLATILE!
content.prevOriginal: Rocket Launchers are cheap, unguided, one-shot missile launchers. Developed by the Marian Hegemony, they often replace more sophisticated equipment that the Periphery nation cannot afford or is unable to repair.1 SHOT! VOLATILE!
content.content: 火箭发射器是一种廉价、无制导、一次性的导弹发射器.有马里安霸权开发,他们通常替代外围国家负担不起或无法维修的更复杂设备.1发装!不稳定!
